pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$() recipes in which essences are required. $(playername), better study first how to obtain those essences.

pages.title: Leather
pages.text: You don't have to kill those poor cows anymore, kill zombies instead!

pages.title: Turtle Egg
pages.text: One way to get a turtle egg, without the wand or silky touch, is by transmuting it. Be a Mommy!

pages.title: Scute
pages.text: Waiting for the $(turtlemancy)turtles$() to grow can be tedious, but thanks to $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$() you'll get between 1 and 3 scutes.

pages.title: Magmatic Turtle Egg
pages.text: One way to get a magmatic turtle egg, without the wand or silky touch, is by transmuting it. Be a Mommy!

pages.title: Magmatic Scute
pages.text: Waiting for the $(turtlemancy)magmatic turtles$() to grow can be tedious, but thanks to $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$() you'll get between 1 and 3 scutes.

pages.title: Rabbit Hide
pages.text: Stop killing those little rabbits right now! Here, take a pacific alternative.

pages.title: Milk Bucket
pages.text: Don't touch the cow like that! Gross! Just... just... take it's essence and turn it into milk, $(playername).

pages.title: Ender Pearl
pages.text: What a beatiful pearl. You need one $(item)Ender Pearl$() to make the recipe, but you get $(l)TWO$() in return.

pages.title: Human Pearl
pages.text: This not-beautiful but not-ugly (human like) pearl will lead you to a village. Sorround yourself with inferior and not turtle-lovers entities and take their emeralds!

pages.title: Spider Eye
pages.text: I don't know why anyone would want this sticky stinky thing but... Well, you can get it if you really want it.

pages.title: Cobweb
pages.text: Blending arthropod essence, a string and soul sand, it will be  transmuted into a spider web. Amazing, right?.

pages.title: Soul Sand
pages.text: If you are too lazy (but, as a proper Turtlemancer, not scared) for a walk in the nether, this recipe will get you the soul sand you need.

pages.title: Heart of the Sea
pages.text: Turtles own the sea, and now, you too.

pages.title: Skeleton Skull
pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtlemancers$() are patient, for sure. But is anyone patient enough to wait for a thunder to strike near a creeper and pray for its explosion to affect the  mob?

pages.title: Zombie Head
pages.text: How does it smell? Bad. How does it look? Bad. How cool is that you can make one? Badass.

pages.title: Dragon Head
pages.text: This is why violence is not the answer. There are other ways of obtaining whatever you want without hurting anyone. Like $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$(), in this case.
